page.title: 15MICHAEL HALL SCHOOL
page.content: Michael Hall School came to the Forest Row area in{1925}and follows the teachings of {Rudolf {Steiner.}There are four classes in the Kindergarten catering for the pre-school child.In the main school there are 13 levels through which the children pass on their way to the public examinations of O and A level. The school differs greatly from the state education in that much emphasis is placed on the spiritual development of the child as well as the social and academic development. Much{Art,Music, {Drama}and{Eurythmy}are taught.Children are kept in their year groups and the bright are encouraged to help the less able and in so doing a greater social awareness is nurtured.The aims of the Anthroposophical movement are clearly advanced in this school.
